short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily Skyrocket your Linkedin with the Power of AI - ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linkmate: Elevate Your LinkedIn Engagement with AI

Use AI to write insightful LinkedIn™ comments, scale your social selling, and save time. Powered by OpenAI™, Linkmate is your ultimate tool for LinkedIn engagement.

Are you struggling to stand out on LinkedIn? Finding it challenging to establish meaningful interactions? Introducing Linkmate – the AI-powered LinkedIn Chrome Extension designed to enhance your networking experience.

Key Features:

AI-Driven Comments: Easily generate and customize comments directly in your LinkedIn feed. Tailor prompts, comment length, and AI model types to match your unique voice.
Profile Following: Keep up with key profiles and never miss an important post from your connections.
Analytics Dashboard: Gain valuable insights into your LinkedIn activities to strategize and measure your engagement effectively.
Automatic Mode: Let Linkmate engage with posts on your behalf, ensuring consistent activity even when you're offline.
Advanced Customization: Control how comments are generated with options for tone, emojis, hashtags, and keywords.
Benefits:

Improved Engagement: Deliver personalized, insightful comments that enhance your networking potential.
Time-Saving: Streamline your workflow and focus on other essential tasks while Linkmate handles your LinkedIn interactions.
Seamless Integration: Operates directly within the LinkedIn comment field, simplifying your engagement process.

Click 'Add to Chrome'.
Pin the extension on your browser.
Log in to LinkedIn and start exploring Linkmate's features.

Customization Options:

Click the Linkmate icon on your toolbar.
Customize prompts, allow/disallow emojis and hashtags, adjust comment length, and set keywords to include or avoid.

Pricing and Plans:

Free Version: Best for tech-savvy individuals using the basic ChatGPT model.
Linkmate Pro: Premium tools and support for $19/month, ideal for business growth.

Transform your LinkedIn interactions with Linkmate and experience smarter, more effective networking today.
